hunted.subtitle: Films You Absolutely Cannot Miss
hunted.discoverDescription: At MovieHunt.fr, our mission is simple: help you find the perfect film idea for every moment. Faced with content overload, we know how difficult it is to choose what film to watch. That's why we're launching a brand new exclusive badge today: the "Hunted" badge.
hunted.whatIsDescription1: The Hunted badge is our seal of approval. It's a visual in the form of a worn cinema ticket. It's placed on posters of films that truly deserve your attention ‚Äî impactful, memorable works, sometimes unknown, but always essential.
hunted.whatIsDescription2: When a film is "Hunted", it means it has been tracked, selected and validated by our cinematic gem radar.
hunted.whyReason1: Because too many films go unnoticed.
hunted.whyReason2: Because it's time to go off the beaten path.
hunted.whyReason3: Because you search every day for what film to watch ‚Äî and we've already done the sorting for you.

hunted.followHashtag: Also follow the hashtag #HuntedbyMovieHunt on Instagram and Twitter to discover the latest gems we've spotted.

howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.subtitle: Our methodology for selecting and reviewing films
howWeWork.intro: At MovieHunt, we are passionate about cinema and we want to share our discoveries with you. Here's how we work to offer you quality recommendations.
howWeWork.selectionDescription: We watch a wide variety of films, from recent releases to classics, from blockbusters to independent films. Each film is carefully chosen for its potential interest.
howWeWork.reviewDescription: After watching a film, we take the time to analyze it in depth. We evaluate the direction, screenplay, acting, cinematography, soundtrack and overall impact.
howWeWork.ratingDescription: Our ratings are on a scale of 1 to 10. They reflect our overall appreciation of the film, taking into account all aspects of the cinematic experience.
howWeWork.huntedDescription: Some films receive our Hunted by MovieHunt badge. These are films that particularly touched us and that we want to highlight, regardless of their rating.
howWeWork.transparencyDescription: We are independent and receive no compensation from studios or streaming platforms. Our opinions are honest and reflect our genuine appreciation.
